text: Bigu (ej Muhammad ʙaroi musrikoni qavmat), onone, ki ʙar tu in guna duo kardanro inkor namudand: ci Allohro ʙixoned, ci Rahmonro ʙixoned farqe namekunad, har kadomro ki az asmoi husno, ki ʙixoned mone' nadorad, nomhoi neku az oni Ust. Ej Pajomʙar, hangome, ki ʙa namoz istodi dar namoz sadojatro ʙaland makun va niz past ham maxon va mijoni in du rohe intixoʙ kun
